name: Nightly BeatBox [RAMADAN SPECIAL]
description:
this was the game before. it looked like shit.

this is how the game looks now 

this game is a rhythm game with no objectives. it is a simple game where you just hit arrows. just a basic game and my FIRST GAME. i listen to my people for my first game to make it look better. if you have any trouble with the game, please answer it on my community board

RAMADAN SPECIAL. we added a special mode for ramadan for people who are fasting. it is Halal mode.
